Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for light scattering.

sunRotX.Wiki: The horizontal angle for the light source (sun). In degrees.

sunRotY.Wiki: The vertical angle for the light source (sun). In degrees.

distanceMul.Wiki: The magnification to apply to the distance of the scattering.

sunR.Wiki: The red component of the coloring for the light source (sun).

sunG.Wiki: The green component of the coloring for the light source (sun).

sunB.Wiki: The blue component of the coloring for the light source (sun).

sunA.Wiki: The alpha component of the coloring for the light source (sun).

lsHGg.Wiki: The scattering direction coefficient, negative is backward, positive is forward.

lsBetaRay.Wiki: The scattering coefficient for the rays. Represents air particles.

lsBetaMie.Wiki: The scattering coefficient for the rays. Represents fine particles.

blendCoef.Wiki: The scattering degree for the rays.

reflectanceR.Wiki: The red component of the coloring for the reflected light from the light source (sun).

reflectanceG.Wiki: The green component of the coloring for the reflected light from the light source (sun).

reflectanceB.Wiki: The blue component of the coloring for the reflected light from the light source (sun).

reflectanceA.Wiki: The alpha component of the coloring for the reflected light from the light source (sun).
